config.hero_headline: AWS Oceania Virtual Community Day 2026 - Test Run
config.hero_subheadline: The second virtual edition of the annual, user-run AWS technical conference.

faq.question: Is this event free?
faq.answer: Yes! AWS Community Day is a free event run by the community for the community.

faq.question: What topics are you looking for?
faq.answer: We welcome talks on any AWS-related topic! This includes architecture, serverless, AI/ML, security, cost optimization, DevOps, data analytics, and more. Share your real-world experiences, lessons learned, or innovative solutions.

faq.question: How long should my talk be?
faq.answer: Most sessions are 20-30 minutes, including Q&A. We also welcome lightning talks (10-15 minutes) for quick insights and tips.

faq.question: Do I need to be an AWS expert to speak?
faq.answer: Not at all! We value diverse perspectives. Whether you're a beginner sharing your learning journey or an expert diving deep into advanced topics, your story matters. Real-world experiences and lessons learned are just as valuable as technical deep-dives.

faq.question: When will I know if my talk is accepted?
faq.answer: We'll review all submissions after the CFP closes and notify speakers within a few weeks. Keep an eye on your email!

faq.question: How do I register?
faq.answer: Simply click the 'Register Now' button and fill out the registration form. It only takes a minute!

faq.question: Will I receive a confirmation email?
faq.answer: Yes! After registering, you'll receive a confirmation email with event details and calendar links. Make sure to check your spam folder if you don't see it.

faq.question: What platform will the event be on?
faq.answer: This is a virtual event. We'll stream live on Twitch and provide links to join interactive sessions. All registered attendees will receive access details closer to the event date.

faq.question: Will sessions be recorded?
faq.answer: Absolutely. All sessions will be available on our YouTube channel after the event, so you can catch up on anything you missed.

faq.question: How do I access the live stream?
faq.answer: Click the 'Watch Live Now' button on the homepage, or visit our Twitch channel directly. The link will be available on the event day.

faq.question: Can I ask questions during sessions?
faq.answer: Yes! Most sessions include Q&A time. You can ask questions in the chat during the live stream, and speakers will address them.

speakers.bio: Dr. Werner Vogels is Chief Technology Officer at Amazon.com where he is responsible for driving the company's customer-centric technology vision.
Jeff Barr is Chief Evangelist or AWS. He started this blog in 2004 and has been writing posts just about non-stop ever since.

schedule.title: Keynote: The Future of Cloud
schedule.description: Join us for the opening keynote.
